text: Here's my idea for @_nightsweekends S5:Tracking 100s of PRs,Issues and Repos is a very difficult task as needed to navigate to various sections to track and manage each of them but NO MORE! Introducing OpenOS: a web OS for your GitHub Issues,Repos and PRs management at one place https://t.co/zjId0XXwWf
